title: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation End of Year Estimate
description: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation End of Year Estimate

summary.description: Details the high-level Income Tax and National Insurance Contributions due

totalEstimatedIncome.title: totalEstimatedIncome
totalEstimatedIncome.description: The total estimated end of year income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

totalBasicRateExtension.description:
The monetary value of the total basic rate extension. 
This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

giftAidRelief.description:
The amount of Gift Aid Relief received, 
This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimal places.

pensionContributionReliefs.description:
The monetary value of the pension contribution reliefs.
This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalTaxableIncome.title: totalTaxableIncome
totalTaxableIncome.description: The total taxable end of year income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No Decimals.

incomeTaxAmount.title: incomeTaxAmount
incomeTaxAmount.description: The estimated end of year Income Tax amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nic2.title: nic2
nic2.description: The estimated end of year Class 2 National Insurance contributions amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nic4.title: nic4
nic4.description: The estimated end of year Class 4 National Insurance contributions amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalNicAmount.title: totalNicAmount
totalNicAmount.description: The estimated end of year combined Class 2 and Class 4 National Insurance contributions amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxNicAmount.title: incomeTaxNicAmount
incomeTaxNicAmount.description: The estimated end-of-year combined Income Tax, Class 2 and Class 4 National Insurance contributions amount. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99

totalStudentLoansRepaymentAmount.title: totalStudentLoansRepaymentAmount
totalStudentLoansRepaymentAmount.description: The estimated end-of-year student loans repayment amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAnnualPaymentsTaxCharged.title: totalAnnualPaymentsTaxCharged
totalAnnualPaymentsTaxCharged.description: The estimated end-of-year annual payments tax charged amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalRoyaltyPaymentsTaxCharged.title: totalRoyaltyPaymentsTaxCharged
totalRoyaltyPaymentsTaxCharged.description: The estimated end-of-year royalty payments tax charged amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalTaxDeducted.title: totalTaxDeducted
totalTaxDeducted.description: The estimated end-of-year total tax deducted amount. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99

totalTaxDeductedBeforeCodingOut.title: totalTaxDeductedBeforeCodingOut
totalTaxDeductedBeforeCodingOut.description: The estimated end-of-year total deducted before coded out. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

saUnderpaymentsCodedOut.title: saUnderpaymentsCodedOut
saUnderpaymentsCodedOut.description: The estimated end-of-year total coded out amount attributed to Self Assessment underpayments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

cgtAmount.title: cgtAmount
cgtAmount.description: The estimated end-of-year Capital Gains Tax amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxNicAndCgtAmount.title: incomeTaxNicAndCgtAmount
incomeTaxNicAndCgtAmount.description: The estimated end-of-year combined Income Tax, National Insurance Contributions and Capital Gains Tax Amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

detail.description: Details the low-level taxable income amounts of each income source

selfEmployments.description: A list of self-employment business detailing the taxable income estimate for each business

selfEmploymentId.title: selfEmploymentId
selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer. Also referred to as businessId.

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end of year income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

finalised.title: finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the self-employment income has been finalised.

ukPropertyFhl.description: Details the taxable income estimate for UK Property FHL

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end of year income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

finalised.title: finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the UK Property FHL income has been finalised.

ukPropertyNonFhl.description: Details the taxable income estimate for UK Property Non-FHL

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end of year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

finalised.title: finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the UK Property Non-FHL income has been finalised.

ukSavings.description: Details the taxable income estimate for UK savings

savingsAccountId.title: savingsAccountId
savingsAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the savings account.

savingsAccountName.title: savingsAccountName
savingsAccountName.description: Friendly account name. Each account name will be unique for that National Insurance number. The account name will be between 1 and 32 characters in length. Allowed characters, including spaces are: mixed case alphanumeric characters and the characters; &'()*,-./@£.

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end of year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

ukDividends.description: Details the taxable income estimate for UK dividends

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end of year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

otherDividends.description: Details the taxable income estimate for other dividends

taxableIncome.description: The estimated end-of-year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

foreignCompanyDividends.description: Details the taxable income estimate for foreign company dividends.

taxableIncome.description: The estimated end-of-year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

stateBenefits.description: Details the taxable income estimate for state benefits

taxableIncome.description: The estimated end-of-year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

ukSecurities.description: Details the taxable income estimate for UK Securities

taxableIncome.description: The estimated end-of-year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

foreignProperty.description: Details the taxable income estimate for Foreign Property

taxableIncome.description: The estimated end-of-year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

finalised.title: finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the Foreign Property income has been finalised.

eeaPropertyFhl.description: Details the taxable income estimate for EEA Property FHL.

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end-of-year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

foreignInterest.description: Details the taxable income estimate for Foreign Interest

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end-of-year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableIncome.description: The estimated end-of-year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

taxableIncome.description: The estimated end-of-year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

links.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description:
A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource
The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint
